---
title: "Irena Papst, PhD"
---

I'm a scientist specializing in infectious disease modelling.

- I currently work as a mathematical modeller in the [National Microbiology Laboratory's Public Health Risk Sciences Division at the Public Health Agency of Canada](https://www.canada.ca/en/public-health/programs/national-microbiology-laboratory-for-professionals.html)
- I am an adjunct professor in [McMaster University's Department of Mathematics & Statistics](https://math.mcmaster.ca), where I help supervise students
- I develop [open-source scientific software](projects.html) and care deeply about [reproducible research](projects.html)
- I have [taught several courses](teaching.html) at the undergraduate level
